name: Fairy Of Math
description:
Playing Fairy Of Math is a great way to improve or refresh you mathematical skills and you will have a lot of fun doing it! The mathematics level is about Middle School/Junior High School.

This game has a very nice and cool graphics, designed specially for your kids. One of the best and cool games for kids. Kids math will definitely help your kid to make more progress in school math.

How To Play
Easy Choices between right and wrong.

** Start Now Free Item Zombie and 5,000 coins. **
